column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday December 23 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Polo Club Blvd:
column4: The roadway is shutdown between Winchester Rd and Fitzgerald Ct due to a serious collision at Fitzgerald Ct.

column3: Traffic Alert for Polo Club Blvd:
column4: Update 11:18 a.m. - The roadway is being reopened.

column3: Traffic Alert for W Short St:
column4: Roadway shutdown between Cheapside and Market St due to a gas leak.
